item.title: Alaska Airlines warns of slower demand as second-quarter profit outlook falls short
item.description: Alaska Airlines warned of weaker demand, pressuring airfares.

item.title: Intel issues weak guidance, says it will slash expenses this year
item.description: In its first earnings report under the leadership of CEO Lip-Bu Tan, Intel said it plans to slash operational and capital expenses in the coming year.

item.title: Comcast stock drops as investors balk at weakness in broadband
item.description: Comcast lost 199,000 total domestic broadband customers, reflecting the continued pressure on the cable giant's cornerstone business.
